content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, although our characters' background isn't relevant here, let's focus on negotiating the rental price for the apartment in Munich. To begin with, I have high expectations for this prime location and outstanding features. 

However, I'm open to hearing your proposed figure. If you come up with a price that aligns with my aspirations, I'll gladly agree to it. Otherwise, I may need to reconsider continuing the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location and features of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 950 Euros per month. With my responsible nature and commitment to following ethical standards, I believe this offer is fair and reasonable. I look forward to hearing your response, or let me know if we need to revisit the negotiation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While appreciating your responsible nature and ethical standards, I must admit that my initial projections placed the rental value higher than your proposed 950 Euros. However, acknowledging your interest in the apartment, I'm willing to make a compromise this time around. I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month! Let's move forward with the lease preparation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
